channel.title: GWD Interface not rendering on resizable/fullscreen mode?
channel.description:
Hey mopar, I was toggling client sizes today and I noticed that while I was in GWD my GWD Killcount interface wasn't rendering on resizable/fullscreen mode >:O
I went into RSInterface and tried shifting the coords to the left of the screen maybe thinking it was rendering behind another interface but no, it's not rendering the GWD Killcount interface in any display mode besides fixed.
If anybody can help me that would be great :> I don't mind posting snippets etc, haven't been on the forums for a while so I'm looking forward to feedback :3

item.title: GWD Interface not rendering on resizable/fullscreen mode?
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Hey mopar, I was toggling client sizes today and I noticed that while I was in GWD my GWD Killcount interface wasn’t rendering on resizable/fullscreen mode >:O

I went into RSInterface and tried shifting the coords to the left of the screen maybe thinking it was rendering behind another interface but no, it’s not rendering the GWD Killcount interface in any display mode besides fixed.

If anybody can help me that would be great :>
I don’t mind posting snippets etc, haven’t been on the forums for a while so I’m looking forward to feedback :3
